title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to defeat him once and for all.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker.

description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.

title: Goodfellas

title: The Matrix

description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

description: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly extraterrestrial lifeform after investigating a mysterious signal.

description: Dom Toretto and his crew must stop Dom's younger brother, Jakob, who is working with a known criminal to create a mass destruction device.

title: Fast X
description: Dom Toretto must protect his family from Dante Reyes, the son of a drug lord Dom defeated years ago.

title: Mission: Impossible
description: An American agent is framed for the deaths of his espionage team.

title: Mission: Impossible II
description: Ethan Hunt must stop a rogue agent from unleashing a deadly virus.

title: Mission: Impossible III
description: Ethan Hunt faces a ruthless arms dealer who threatens his personal life.

title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
description: The IMF is shut down, and Ethan Hunt and his team must go rogue to clear their names.

title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
description: Ethan Hunt and his team hunt a dangerous international rogue organization known as the Syndicate.

title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
description: Ethan Hunt and his allies race against time after a mission goes wrong.

title: Salt
description: A CIA agent goes on the run after being accused of being a Russian spy.

title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
description: A married couple, unaware that they are both assassins for rival organizations, are assigned to kill each other.

title: Eternals
description: A group of immortal heroes emerge from the shadows to protect humanity from their ancient counterparts.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
description: A martial-arts master confronts the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.

title: Black Widow
description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

title: Wonder Woman 1984
description: Diana Prince is living quietly among mortals in the 1980s when she encounters two new foes.

title: Aquaman
description: Arthur Curry, the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

title: Justice League
description: Batman and Wonder Woman assemble a team of metahumans to stand against a new threat.

title: Suicide Squad
description: A secret government agency recruits imprisoned supervillains to execute dangerous black ops missions.

title: Man of Steel
description: A young boy learns that he has extraordinary powers and is not of this Earth.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
description: Batman must protect Gotham from a ruthless terrorist who plans to destroy the city.

title: Batman Begins
description: Bruce Wayne, inspired by justice, trains to fight corruption in Gotham.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
description: Frodo and Sam continue their journey to Mordor, while Aragorn, Legolas, and Gimli join forces with the people of Rohan.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: An orphaned boy discovers he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
description: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to face a terrifying new threat.

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione learn about an escaped convict who poses a threat to Harry.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
description: Harry is mysteriously chosen to compete in the Triwizard Tournament.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: Harry returns for his fifth year at Hogwarts and discovers that the wizarding community is in denial about Lord Voldemort's return.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: As Harry begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers a powerful book and learns more about Voldemort's past.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione set out to destroy the secret to Voldemort's immortality.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
description: The final chapter of the Harry Potter series.

title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
description: A writer of magical creatures ventures to New York and causes chaos when some of his beasts escape.

title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
description: Gellert Grindelwald escapes and begins gathering followers to rule over all non-magical beings.

title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
description: Albus Dumbledore entrusts Newt Scamander with a mission to stop Grindelwald.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut is presumed dead and left behind by his crew on Mars.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is invited to evaluate the human qualities of a highly advanced human-like A.I.

title: Transcendence
description: A scientist's consciousness is uploaded to a computer, leading to unforeseen consequences.

title: Prometheus
description: A team of explorers travel to a distant planet to investigate the origins of humanity.

title: District 9
description: An alien race is forced to live in slum conditions in Johannesburg, South Africa.

title: Sunshine
description: A team of astronauts is sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying sun.

title: Serenity
description: The crew of the spaceship Serenity tries to evade an assassin who is hunting one of their members.

title: The Day After Tomorrow
description: A climatologist must embark on a perilous journey to reach his son who is trapped in New York City after a sudden ice age.

title: The Cell
description: A child psychologist is sent into the mind of a coma patient serial killer to try and find his latest victim.

title: Dark City
description: A man awakens in a strange hotel with no memory of who he is and is pursued by mysterious figures.

title: The Fifth Element
description: A cab driver finds himself transporting a supreme being who is the key to the survival of Earth.

title: 12 Monkeys
description: A prisoner is sent back in time to gather information about a deadly virus that wiped out most of the human population.

title: Total Recall
description: A construction worker receives an implant that unlocks suppressed memories of being a secret agent.

title: Brazil
description: A bureaucrat tries to correct an administrative error that affects a woman he sees in his dreams.

title: Tron
description: A computer programmer is sucked into a virtual world where he must fight to survive.

title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: A scientist discovers a potion that allows him to separate the good and evil parts of his personality.

title: A Trip to the Moon
description: A group of astronomers travel to the Moon in a cannon-propelled capsule.

title: Frankenstein
description: A dedicated but obsessed scientist tries to create life by gathering body parts from various sources.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship and headed toward Earth.

title: Altered States
description: A scientist experiments with sensory deprivation and powerful drugs, leading to terrifying physical and psychological changes.

title: Solaris
description: A psychologist travels to a space station orbiting a mysterious planet to investigate the crew's bizarre behavior.

title: Planet of the Apes
description: An astronaut crew crash-lands on a strange planet where intelligent talking apes rule and humans are held captive.

title: 12 Angry Men
description: A jury is forced to reconsider its verdict after one juror casts doubt on the evidence.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Lost in Translation
description: A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

title: Rashomon
description: A retired detective with a fear of heights is hired to follow a woman who exhibits strange behavior.

title: The Lion King
description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Toy Story
description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Toy Story 3
description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college.

title: Up
description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

title: Finding Nemo
description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Inside Out
description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

title: Coco
description: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

title: Shrek
description: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: Monsters, Inc.
description: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

title: How to Train Your Dragon
description: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

title: The Incredibles
description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

title: Akira
description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by his childhood friend, the gang leader.

title: Ghost in the Shell
description: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: Your Name.
description: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

title: The Batman
description: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

title: Barbie
description: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

title: Poor Things
description: The incredible tale about the fantastical evolution of Bella Baxter, a young woman brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: When oil is discovered in 1920s Oklahoma under Osage Nation land, the Osage people are murdered one by one - until the FBI steps in to unravel the mystery.

title: The Holdovers
description: A cranky history teacher at a remote prep school is forced to remain on campus over the holidays with a troubled student who has no place to go.

title: Past Lives
description: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrested apart after her family emigrates from South Korea. Two decades later, they are reunited in New York for one fateful week as they confront notions of destiny, love, and the choices that make a life.

title: Anatomy of a Fall
description: A woman is suspected of her husband's murder, and their blind son faces a moral dilemma as the sole witness.

title: The Zone of Interest
description: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

title: All Quiet on the Western Front
description: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

title: Triangle of Sadness
description: A fashion model celebrity couple join an eventful cruise for the super-rich.

title: The Banshees of Inisherin
description: Two lifelong friends find themselves at an impasse when one abruptly ends their relationship, with alarming consequences for both of them.

title: Tár
description: Set in the international world of Western classical music, the film centers on Lydia Tár, widely considered one of the greatest living composer-conductors and the very first female director of a major German orchestra.

title: Elvis
description: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star in the 1950s while maintaining a complex relationship with his manager, Colonel Tom Parker.

title: Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery
description: Famed Southern detective Benoit Blanc travels to Greece for his latest case.

title: Knives Out
description: A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

title: Ford v Ferrari
description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Hitler's army finds out his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.

title: Marriage Story
description: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: Little Women
description: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

title: Uncut Gems
description: With his debts mounting and angry collectors closing in, a fast-talking New York City jeweler risks everything in hope of staying afloat and alive.

title: The Lighthouse
description: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: Midsommar
description: A couple travels to Scandinavia to visit a rural hometown's fabled Swedish mid-summer festival. What begins as an idyllic retreat quickly devolves into an increasingly violent and bizarre competition at the hands of a pagan cult.

title: Hereditary
description: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Us
description: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgängers appear and begin to terrorize them.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: A Quiet Place Part II
description: Following the events at home, the Abbott family now face the terrors of the outside world. Forced to venture into the unknown, they realize the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.

title: It
description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Sinister
description: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8mm home movies films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

title: Insidious
description: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

title: Saw
description: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

title: The Ring
description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone one week to the day after they view it.

title: Scream
description: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of the game.

title: Halloween
description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

title: The Thing
description: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: The Fly
description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

title: Poltergeist
description: A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.

title: Evil Dead II
description: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

title: Army of Darkness
description: A man is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must battle an army of the dead and retrieve the Necronomicon so he can return home.

title: Die Hard
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: Die Hard with a Vengeance
description: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Lethal Weapon
description: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

title: Predator
description: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

title: RoboCop
description: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

title: Terminator
description: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: Beverly Hills Cop
description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

title: Ghostbusters
description: Three parapsychologists forced out of their university funding set up shop as a unique ghost removal service in New York City, attracting frightened yet skeptical customers.

title: Gremlins
description: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

title: The Goonies
description: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

title: Stand by Me
description: After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

title: The Breakfast Club
description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite the principal's obsessive determination to catch him.

title: Clueless
description: Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking order. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first cajoles two teachers into dating each other.

title: Mean Girls
description: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

title: Legally Blonde
description: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend. She decides to follow him to law school. While there, she figures out that there is more to her than just looks.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
description: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

title: Notting Hill
description: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

title: Love Actually
description: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: About Time
description: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
description: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
description: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never done the deed only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mom.

title: Superbad
description: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

title: Step Brothers
description: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
description: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top-rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 1970s, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

title: Tropic Thunder
description: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

title: Zoolander
description: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

title: Dumb and Dumber
description: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
description: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of a missing dolphin mascot of a football team.

title: The Mask
description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Bruce Almighty
description: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

title: Liar Liar
description: A fast-talking lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

title: The Truman Show
description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: Man on the Moon
description: The life and career of the eccentric avant-garde comedian Andy Kaufman.

title: Adaptation.
description: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

title: Being John Malkovich
description: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.

title: The Virgin Suicides
description: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents.

title: Marie Antoinette
description: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen, and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

title: Somewhere
description: After withdrawing to the Chateau Marmont, a passionless Hollywood actor reexamines his life when his eleven-year-old daughter surprises him with a visit.

title: The Bling Ring
description: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.

title: Priscilla
description: When teenage Priscilla Beaulieu meets Elvis Presley, the man who is already a meteoric rock-and-roll superstar becomes someone entirely unexpected in private moments: a thrilling crush, an ally in loneliness, a vulnerable best friend.

title: Civil War
description: A journey across a dystopian future America, following a team of military-embedded journalists as they race against time to reach DC before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

title: Annihilation
description: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

title: Men
description: A young woman goes on a solo vacation to the English countryside after the death of her ex-husband.

title: Devs
description: A computer engineer investigates the secretive development division in her company, which she believes is behind the disappearance of her boyfriend.

title: 28 Days Later
description: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

title: Trainspotting
description: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

title: 127 Hours
description: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.

title: Steve Jobs
description: Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.

title: Yesterday
description: A struggling musician realizes he's the only person on Earth who can remember The Beatles after waking up in an alternate reality where they never existed.

title: Baby Driver
description: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
description: In a magically realistic version of Toronto, a young man must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes one by one in order to win her heart.

title: Hot Fuzz
description: A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town with a dark secret.

title: Shaun of the Dead
description: A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

title: The World's End
description: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from twenty years earlier unwittingly become humanity's only hope for survival.

title: Last Night in Soho
description: An aspiring fashion designer is mysteriously able to enter the 1960s, where she encounters a dazzling wannabe singer. But the glamour is not all it appears to be, and the dreams of the past start to crack and splinter into something darker.

title: Promising Young Woman
description: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

title: Saltburn
description: A student at Oxford University finds himself drawn into the world of a charming and aristocratic classmate, who invites him to his eccentric family's sprawling estate for a summer never to be forgotten.

title: Call Me by Your Name
description: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

title: Bones and All
description: Maren, a young woman learning how to survive on the margins of society, finds her first love with Lee, an intense and disenfranchised drifter.

title: Challengers
description: Tashi, a tennis player turned coach, has transformed her husband from a mediocre player into a world-famous grand slam champion. To jolt him out of his losing streak, she makes him play a challenger event -- close to the lowest level of tournament on the pro tour.

title: Suspiria
description: A darkness swirls at the center of a world-renowned dance company, one that will engulf the artistic director, an ambitious young dancer, and a grieving psychotherapist.

title: Tenet
description: Armed with only one word, Tenet, and fighting for the survival of the entire world, a Protagonist journeys through a twilight world of international espionage on a mission that will unfold in something beyond real time.

title: Following
description: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

title: Insomnia
description: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

title: Death Proof
description: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

title: Planet Terror
description: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.

title: Sin City
description: An exploration of the dark and miserable Basin City and three of its residents, all of whom are caught up in violent corruption.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
description: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

title: Desperado
description: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town as he goes after Bucho, the kingpin who killed his girlfriend.

title: El Mariachi
description: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
description: Hitman "El Mariachi" becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

title: Machete
description: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

title: Spy Kids
description: The children of the greatest secret agents have to save their parents from danger.

title: Alita: Battle Angel
description: A deactivated cyborg is revived, but cannot remember anything of her past life and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

title: True Lies
description: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman.

title: The Abyss
description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

title: Aliens
description: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

title: Kingdom of Heaven
description: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

title: Black Hawk Down
description: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

title: Hannibal
description: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

title: Red Dragon
description: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal Lecter.

title: Manhunter
description: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial murderer named "The Tooth Fairy" by the media.

title: Thelma & Louise
description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

title: G.I. Jane
description: A female Senator succeeds in enrolling a woman into Combined Reconnaissance Team training where everyone expects her to fail.

title: Legend
description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from both destroying the daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

title: Matchstick Men
description: A phobic con artist and his protégé are about to pull off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

title: American Gangster
description: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

title: Body of Lies
description: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

title: Robin Hood
description: In 12th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

title: Alien: Covenant
description: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

title: The Last Duel
description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

title: House of Gucci
description: When Patrizia Reggiani, an outsider from humble beginnings, marries into the Gucci family, her unbridled ambition begins to unravel the family legacy.

title: Napoleon
description: An epic that details the checkered rise and fall of French Emperor Napoleon Bonaparte and his relentless journey to power through the prism of his addictive, volatile relationship with his wife, Josephine.

title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
description: Christopher Columbus' discovery of the Americas and the effect this has on the indigenous people.

title: White Squall
description: Teenage boys discover discipline and camaraderie on an ill-fated sailing voyage.

title: Someone to Watch Over Me
description: A married police detective falls for the witness to a murder, whom he is assigned to protect.

title: Black Rain
description: Two New York City cops arrest a member of the Yakuza and must escort him back to Japan. On arrival, he escapes, and the two policemen find themselves dragged deeper into the Japanese underworld.

title: Days of Thunder
description: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

title: Unstoppable
description: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

title: Crimson Tide
description: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger-happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

title: Man on Fire
description: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

title: Déjà Vu
description: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

title: The Taking of Pelham 123
description: Armed men hijack a New York City subway train, holding the passengers hostage in return for a ransom, and turning an ordinary day's work for a dispatcher into a face-off with the mastermind behind the crime.

title: Enemy of the State
description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious crime.

title: Spy Game
description: Retiring C.I.A. agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

title: The Fan
description: An all-star baseball player becomes the obsession of a knife salesman who begins to take his worship a little too far.

title: Domino
description: A recount of the life of Domino Harvey, who leaves her career as a Ford model to become a bounty hunter.

title: John Wick
description: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

title: John Wick: Chapter 2
description: After returning to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, John Wick discovers that a large bounty has been put on his life.

title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
description: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

title: Nobody
description: A bystander who intervenes to help a woman being harassed by a group of men becomes the target of a vengeful drug lord.

title: Atomic Blonde
description: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

title: Bullet Train
description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

title: Deadpool
description: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.

title: Deadpool 2
description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.

title: Logan
description: In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

title: X-Men
description: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

title: X2: X-Men United
description: The X-Men band together to find a mutant assassin who has made an attempt on the President's life, while the Mutant Academy is attacked by military forces.

title: X-Men: First Class
description: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Magneto's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a rift between them.

title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
description: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

title: Ant-Man
description: Armed with a super-suit with the astonishing ability to shrink in scale but increase in strength, cat burglar Scott Lang must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, plan and pull off a heist that will save the world.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

title: Thor: Ragnarok
description: Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
description: The Guardians struggle to keep together as a team while dealing with their personal family issues, notably Star-Lord's encounter with his father the ambitious celestial being Ego.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
description: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with a fellow Avenger and S.H.I.E.L.D. agent, Black Widow, to battle a new threat from history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: Political involvement in the Avengers' affairs causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.
